variations.primary_text:
You have tried the medications. You have done the physical therapy. You may even have surgery on the calendar.

Before you go under the knife, there is something worth knowing: patients at Eastern Healing Traditions have canceled planned surgeries after as few as three acupuncture sessions.

That is not a marketing claim. It is what happened for Patricia, who came in with sciatica so severe she could barely walk. After five sessions, she reported 95% pain relief — and canceled the shoulder surgery she had been dreading.

Or Patsy, who lived with chronic shoulder pain for twenty years. Three treatments. Twenty years of pain, resolved.

Dr. Vel Natarajan holds a DACM — the highest credential in Traditional Chinese Medicine. He does not guess. He conducts a thorough evaluation, explains exactly what is happening in your body, and builds a treatment plan specific to your condition, your history, and your life.

This is not about replacing your doctor. It is about exploring what becomes possible when you add 3,000 years of proven medicine to your care.

If you are living with chronic pain and nothing has worked well enough, a conversation costs you nothing but a phone call.

variations.headline: When Nothing Else Has Worked

variations.primary_text:
If you are managing an autoimmune condition — Hashimoto's, Crohn's, lupus, ulcerative colitis, psoriatic arthritis — you already know the cycle. Flare. Medication adjustment. Side effects. Temporary stability. Repeat.

You are not imagining that something is missing from your care. There is an entire system of medicine that has been treating these conditions for thousands of years, and it works alongside the treatment you are already receiving.

Traditional Chinese Medicine approaches autoimmune conditions differently. Instead of suppressing the immune response, TCM works to restore balance — reducing inflammation, calming overactive immune pathways, and supporting your body's ability to regulate itself.

Dr. Vel Natarajan, DACM, is the highest-credentialed TCM practitioner in Lake County. He treats autoimmune conditions with a combination of acupuncture, Chinese herbal medicine, and Eastern nutrition therapy — a comprehensive approach that addresses the root cause, not just the symptoms you report to your specialist.

This is not about replacing your rheumatologist or gastroenterologist. It is about filling the gap they cannot.

Eastern Healing Traditions | Grayslake, IL
